for (m in 1:9741){
  for (n in 1:46){
      pathway_geneexp_patient_S[[n]]= SkinnyBoy[match(unlist(x$ID[n]),genes_ensembl_SB),m]
     banana = -match(unlist(x$ID[n]),genes_ensembl_SB)
     banana <- banana[!is.na(banana)]
     non_pathway_geneexp_patient_vector_S = SkinnyBoy[banana,m]
     df_pathway_patient_S[n,m] = t.test(pathway_geneexp_patient_S[[n]], non_pathway_geneexp_patient_vector_S)$p.value
  }
}

for (i in 1:46){
  pathway_geneexp_patient_SB [[i]]= SkinnyBoy[match(unlist(x$ID[i]), genes_ensembl_SB), 300]
  banana6= -match(unlist(x$ID[i]),genes_ensembl_SB)
  banana7 <- banana6[!is.na(banana6)]
  non_pathway_geneexp_patient1_vector_SB = SkinnyBoy[banana7,300]
  df_pathway_patient_SB[i,2] = t.test(pathway_geneexp_patient_SB[[i]], non_pathway_geneexp_patient1_vector_SB)$p.value
}



df_pathway_patient_S_pvalue = data.frame ()

for (n in 1:46){
    
 df_pathway_patient_S_pvalue[n,2] = number_pathway[n]*df_pathway_patient_SB[n,2]
